mdRecord.dcterms:title: Correspondence Addressed to Mr. Stigleman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3 separate pieces of correspondence, undated but since they are addressed to Mr. Stigleman instead of Captain Stigleman or Dr. Stigleman are probably very early, 2 original pieces.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
